entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle changing to light snow and ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.
